uncertainties: Limited hepatotoxicity surveillance data for meperidine/pethidine in modern clinical practice
Normeperidine accumulation in renal impairment causes neurotoxicity but hepatotoxic potential unclear
Historical case reports may involve confounding from polysubstance use or underlying liver disease
Relative hepatotoxicity compared to other opioids difficult to assess due to decreased contemporary use
citations: Latta KS, et al. Meperidine: a critical review. Am J Ther. 2002;9(1):53-68.
